revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Team Rockets Hideout |image = [[File:Team Rockets Hideout.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Team Rockets Hideout |tokens = 5,500 |location = Mahogany Town }} '''Team Rockets Hideout''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 104,100 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !!
